about_the_game:
**TRIGGER WARNING**
**THIS GAME HAS DEPICTIONS OF SUICIDE AND MURDER. THERE IS AN BABY IN THE GAME THAT IS UNDEAD. THERE IS ALSO GORE AND DEATH. VIEWER DISCRETION ADVISED**



Step into the eerie shadows of an old haunted house in 'Lost in memories,' a gripping narrative-driven game that will unravel the mysteries of the past. As you wander through the decaying corridors and dimly lit rooms, you will gradually piece together fragments of memories that reveal why the house feels hauntingly familiar.

Immerse yourself in a chilling atmosphere filled with suspense and a sense of foreboding as you explore the secrets hidden within the walls of the old mansion. Uncover clues, solve puzzles, and confront the ghosts of the past as you delve deeper into the dark history of the house and your own forgotten past.

With haunting visuals, a haunting soundtrack, and a compelling story-line that will keep you on the edge of your seat, 'Lost in memories' offers a hauntingly beautiful and unforgettable experience that will challenge your mind and your courage. Are you ready to confront the echoes of the past and uncover the truth behind the haunting mysteries of the old house?

name: Lost In Memories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11800H @ 2.30GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
